thread.title: Royals limit Blue Jays to 3 hits in Game 1 ALCS victory
thread.title_full: Royals limit Blue Jays to 3 hits in Game 1 ALCS victory

title: Royals limit Blue Jays to 3 hits in Game 1 ALCS victory
text:
Royals limit Blue Jays to 3 hits in Game 1 ALCS victory POSTED: 10:25 PM CDT Oct 16, 2015 KANSAS CITY, Mo. - 
Kansas City's pitching proved its strength again in the playoffs. 
The Royals limited the powerful Blue Jays offense to just three hits in a 5-0 Game 1 victory in the American League Championship Series Friday night in Kansas City. The two teams will play again Saturday afternoon at 2:30 p.m. at Kauffman Stadium.
